content: bring the winter magic indoors with beautiful diy crochet snowflakes making your own handmade crochet snowflake is one of the best ways to get your family into the christmas spirit crochet snowflakes are extremely easy and super fun to make they work up really quick and you can have a bunch of these beautiful crochet snowflakes in no time at all today am sharing the pattern for 5 minutes crochet snowflake with embroidery floss embroidery threads are not only great for sewing purpose but they are also great for crocheting cute little projects the pattern is super easy and you can have your snowflake in just under 5 minutes crocheted snowflakes are great to decorate your christmas tree and they also make awesome gift toppers too materials used - cotton embroidery floss 3 mm crochet hook size - 3 inches checkout the video tutorial here https //youtu be/jphe5npzrqy
